name: Via Mascheroni 2
description: Our biggest building is located in Via Lorenzo Mascheroni, 2 Milan (Italy). Here you will find the majority of the services we offer.
htgt: {"ways" : [{ "kind" : "bus", "info":"Take the bus N. 91 to Lotto (Fieramilanocity) from P.za Luigi Di Savoia. Leave the bus at P.za Stuparich stop (around 30 minutes). Then, from Via Albani P.za Stuparich take the bus n.68 to Via Bergognone and leave the bus at the Conciliazione M1 stop (around 15 minutes)"}, {"kind" : "car", "info" : "For our guests that comes from other cities different from Milan, we suggest to direct in the west part of Milan using SP11 road or Tangenziale. Via Mascheroni crosses via Boccaccio, parallel road of Corso Magenta."}, {"kind" : "tube", "info":"The nearest stop is Conciliazione (Line 1 - red). If you arrive in Milano Centrale Railway Station, take the underground line 2 (green) for Abbiategrasso, then change line at Cadorna FN M1 stop. Here you can travel with M1 (Bisceglie direction) up to Conciliazione"}, {"kind" : "sub", "info" : "Need to go deeper?"}], "gMapsDicrectionsURL":"https://www.google.it/maps/dir//Via+Lorenzo+Mascheroni,+2,+20123+Milano/@45.4678005,9.164102,16z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m9!4m8!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x4786c15b6be09f8b:0x2a6cc8210278d250!2m2!1d9.1684794!2d45.4677931!3e0"}

name: Via Saronno 5
description: Our newest building is located in Via Saronno, 5 Milan (Italy). Here you will find the most requested services.
htgt: {"ways" : [{ "kind" : "bus", "info":"This stop is reached by many bus: With bus n. 19, leave in Rosario stops (Ospedale Sacco) and walk for 10 minutes in the directions of the bus. You can reach with bus 10th leaving it in P.za Gramsci, from where the destination is in the other side of the road. Otherwise you can take bus 26 or 29 and they both arrives in via Saronno in front of our location."}, {"kind" : "car", "info" : "If you arrive from other cities, you can easily reach the city from the highway A4. From the southern part of Milan, the Tangenziale could be very comfortable "}, {"kind" : "tube", "info":"The nearest stop is Gerusalemme (Line 5 - purple). If you arrive in Milano Centrale Railway Station, take the underground line 2 (green) for Abbiategrasso, then change line at Garibaldi FN M3 stop."}, {"kind" : "sub", "info" : "Need to go deeper?"}], "gMapsDicrectionsURL":"https://www.google.com/maps?ll=45.478701,9.150439&z=14&t=m&hl=it-IT&gl=IT&mapclient=embed&daddr=Via+Saronno,+5+20154+Milano@45.4831238,9.1673691"}

name: Via Taormina 2
description: This locations is the home of all our experimental treatments, as well as our specialized analysis laboratory.
htgt: {"ways" : [{ "kind" : "bus", "info":"Otside of our building there is the stop of bus 51. From via Lussinpiccolo there is also the stop of bus 42, but from piazzale Istria you can find many othher buses and trams: 5, 7 and 31."}, {"kind" : "car", "info" : "If you arrive from other cities you will find very comfortable the A4 high way and E64 road. In this location, we also provide a free watched parking for our guests."}, {"kind" : "tube", "info":"The nearest stop is Istria (Line 1 - red).
